Question
========

A person achieves a score of 12.1 good on a Statistics test. The mean score of all participants in the test is 13.7 with a standard deviation 2. The z-score of the person with 12.1 right is then equal to

Answerlist
----------

* -2.06
* -0.8
* 0.45

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

-2.06: Incorrect
-0.8: Correct
* 0.45: Incorrect
